ygData.subject: Re: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am a rich level 14, what can i say? Dont ask how or for tips, because i have none. Just fought legos in cb undead in befallen and that stuff. Kargath PS:
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,
I am a rich level 14, what can i say? Dont ask how or for tips, because
i have none. Just fought legos in cb undead in befallen and that stuff.

Kargath

PS: my name is not Shannon as it may show up as, thats my moms name,
mine is Doug

"Cliff, Monty" wrote:
>
> From: "Cliff, Monty" <mcliff@...>
>
>
> Just curious, but how did you afford all this stuff at L14 and still
> be able to do jewlcraft? I couldn't even afford to buy all my spells
> at L14 with any of my characters (have 3 spell casters over L14), I
> must be missing something.
>
> Drogo Darkbane
>
> >Here is what Kargath has at level 14 (everything not listed is bronze
> >and im not twinked):
> >Bracer of Eroillis (got a good deal, only 30 pp)
> >Screaming Mace (120 pp)
> >Shiny Brass Shield (40 pp)
> >Silver Carnillian Wedding Ring (im a jewler and Kargath is married)
> >Silver Amber Ring
> >Gold Amber Earing (30 pp)
> >Onyx Earing (20 pp)
>
> >Kargath
> >High Elf
> >Cleric of the 14th circle
>
>
